name: Roblox Days Union - The Final City (READ DESC)
description:
A Days Union style for all the Roblox Myth fans out there!
|
Lime green colours everywhere! (not really)
Hope you enjoy this style.

(p.s it only works on dark mode.)

IF THERE IS GREEN ON OTHER SITES, YOU NEED TO EDIT THE URL DOMAIN PART.
Step 1: Go to your extensions and click "Stylish", and click the 3 dots and click "manage all styles"
Step 2: Click "Edit" on the Days Union style, it will send you to the coding section.
Step 3: Scroll to the bottom of the page (not the code part) and you will see "Everything" and "Specify", Click on specify and click "URL" and change it to "URLs on the domain", next to it is a text box, type in www.roblox.com or roblox.com and click "add" at the end of the text box.
Step 4: Save the code by clicking "Save" at the top left corner.
additional_info:
Please know this is my first style for Roblox.
I have other styles that are decorated but scripted by other people, just like this one.

Credits: faetalic for the theme
| DefinetlyArie for the fading play button.
| iiHeta for the custom avatar background.
| GalacticCosmos for some parts of the late 2016 roblox.

Will update more if the original creators allow me to do so.
